quote: I love you like the woman I am now. Not the girl I was. I’m battered and bruised and I’m tougher, but I’m still here. I’m scared to death, but I’m more frightened of a life without you.
quote_letters: I LOVE YOU LIKE THE WOMAN I AM NOW NOT THE GIRL I WAS IM BATTERED AND BRUISED AND IM TOUGHER BUT IM STILL HERE IM SCARED TO DEATH BUT IM MORE FRIGHTENED OF A LIFE WITHOUT YOU
